about.details:
Incorporated in 2013, Bhavnagar, Gujarat based Shubhlaxmi Jewel Art Limited is a company engaged in the business of jewellery and ornaments. The company is engaged in both the retail and wholesale business.

The product portfolio of the company includes a wide range of jewellery made of gold, silver, diamond and platinum studded with precious and semi-precious stones.

Shubhlaxmi Jewel Art has its own showroom located at Bhavnagar. The company is also setting up a manufacturing facility in the city to cater to the demands of the local customers.

The company's total revenue was Rs 4684.92 lakhs, Rs 4343.54 lakhs and Rs 4743.39 lakhs for 2017-18, 2016-17 and 2015-16 respectively.

The EBITDA was Rs 264.65 lakhs, Rs 262.28 lakhs and Rs 244.39 lakhs for 2017-18, 2016-17 and 2015-16 respectively.

The PAT was Rs 82.43 lakhs, Rs 64.80 lakhs and Rs 36.78 lakhs for 2017-18, 2016-17 and 2015-16 respectively.

faqs.question: What is the Shubhlaxmi Jewel IPO?
faqs.answer:
Shubhlaxmi Jewel IPO is a SME IPO of 2504000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹6.51 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹26 per share. The minimum order quantity is 4000.

The IPO opens on November 22, 2018, and closes on November 27, 2018.

Link Intime India Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Shubhlaxmi Jewel IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Shubhlaxmi Jewel IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Shubhlaxmi Jewel IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Shubhlaxmi Jewel IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Shubhlaxmi Jewel IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Shubhlaxmi Jewel IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Shubhlaxmi Jewel IPO opens on November 22, 2018 and closes on November 27, 2018.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Shubhlaxmi Jewel IPO?
faqs.answer: Shubhlaxmi Jewel IPO lot size is 4000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,04,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Shubhlaxmi Jewel IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Shubhlaxmi Jewel IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
